trans-unit.source: Create a line-of-business web app on Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Create a line-of-business web app on Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: This guide provides a technical overview of how to use Azure App Service Web Apps to create intranet, line-of-business applications.
trans-unit.target: This guide provides a technical overview of how to use Azure App Service Web Apps to create intranet, line-of-business applications.

trans-unit.source: This includes authentication strategies, service bus relay, and monitoring.
trans-unit.target: This includes authentication strategies, service bus relay, and monitoring.

trans-unit.source: Create a line-of-business web app on Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Create a line-of-business web app on Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: [Azure App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714) Web Apps is a great choice for line-of-business applications.
trans-unit.target: [Azure App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714) Web Apps is a great choice for line-of-business applications.

trans-unit.source: These applications are intranet applications that should be secured for internal business use.
trans-unit.target: These applications are intranet applications that should be secured for internal business use.

trans-unit.source: They usually require authentication, typically against a corporate directory, and some access to or integration with on-premises data and services.
trans-unit.target: They usually require authentication, typically against a corporate directory, and some access to or integration with on-premises data and services.

trans-unit.source: There are major benefits of moving line-of-business applications to App Service Web Apps, such as:
trans-unit.target: There are major benefits of moving line-of-business applications to App Service Web Apps, such as:

trans-unit.source: scale up and down with dynamic workloads, such as an application that handles annual performance reviews.
trans-unit.target: scale up and down with dynamic workloads, such as an application that handles annual performance reviews.

trans-unit.source: During the review period, traffic would spike to high levels for a large company.
trans-unit.target: During the review period, traffic would spike to high levels for a large company.

trans-unit.source: Azure provides scaling options that enable the company to scale out to handle the load during the high-traffic review period while saving money by scaling back for the rest of the year.
trans-unit.target: Azure provides scaling options that enable the company to scale out to handle the load during the high-traffic review period while saving money by scaling back for the rest of the year.

trans-unit.source: focus more on application development and less on infrastructure acquisition and management
trans-unit.target: focus more on application development and less on infrastructure acquisition and management

trans-unit.source: greater support for employees and partners to use the application from anywhere.
trans-unit.target: greater support for employees and partners to use the application from anywhere.

trans-unit.source: Users do not need to be connected to the corporate network through in order to use the application, and the IT group avoids complex reverse proxy solutions.
trans-unit.target: Users do not need to be connected to the corporate network through in order to use the application, and the IT group avoids complex reverse proxy solutions.

trans-unit.source: There are several authentication options to make sure that access to company applications are protected.
trans-unit.target: There are several authentication options to make sure that access to company applications are protected.

trans-unit.source: Below is an example of a line-of-business application running on App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: Below is an example of a line-of-business application running on App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: It demonstrates what you can do simply by composing Web Apps together with other services with minimal technical investments.
trans-unit.target: It demonstrates what you can do simply by composing Web Apps together with other services with minimal technical investments.

trans-unit.source: Click on an element in the topography to read more about it.
trans-unit.target: Click on an element in the topography to read more about it.

trans-unit.source: This guide presents some of the most common areas and tasks that are aligned with line-of-business applications.
trans-unit.target: This guide presents some of the most common areas and tasks that are aligned with line-of-business applications.

trans-unit.source: However, there are other capabilities of Azure App Service Web Apps that you can use in your specific implementation.
trans-unit.target: However, there are other capabilities of Azure App Service Web Apps that you can use in your specific implementation.

trans-unit.source: To review these capabilities, also see the other guides on [Global Web Presence](web-sites-global-web-presence-solution-overview.md) and [Digital Marketing Campaigns](web-sites-digital-marketing-application-solution-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: To review these capabilities, also see the other guides on [Global Web Presence](web-sites-global-web-presence-solution-overview.md) and [Digital Marketing Campaigns](web-sites-digital-marketing-application-solution-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Bring existing assets
trans-unit.target: Bring existing assets

trans-unit.source: Bring your existing web assets to App Service Web Apps from a variety of languages and frameworks.
trans-unit.target: Bring your existing web assets to App Service Web Apps from a variety of languages and frameworks.

trans-unit.source: Your existing web assets can run on App Service Web Apps, whether they are .NET, PHP, Java, Node.js, or Python.
trans-unit.target: Your existing web assets can run on App Service Web Apps, whether they are .NET, PHP, Java, Node.js, or Python.

trans-unit.source: You can move them to Web Apps using your familiar [FTP] tools or your source control management system.
trans-unit.target: You can move them to Web Apps using your familiar [FTP] tools or your source control management system.

trans-unit.source: Web Apps supports direct publishing from popular source control options, such as [Visual Studio], [Visual Studio Online], and [Git] - local, GitHub, BitBucket, DropBox, Mercurial, etc..
trans-unit.target: Web Apps supports direct publishing from popular source control options, such as [Visual Studio], [Visual Studio Online], and [Git] - local, GitHub, BitBucket, DropBox, Mercurial, etc..

trans-unit.source: Secure your assets
trans-unit.target: Secure your assets

trans-unit.source: Secure assets by encryption, authenticate corporate users whether they are on-site or remote, and authorize their use of assets.
trans-unit.target: Secure assets by encryption, authenticate corporate users whether they are on-site or remote, and authorize their use of assets.

trans-unit.source: Protect internal assets against eavesdroppers with [HTTPS].
trans-unit.target: Protect internal assets against eavesdroppers with [HTTPS].

trans-unit.source: The **\*.azurewebsites.net** domain name already comes with an SSL certificate, and if you use your custom domain, you can bring your SSL certificate for it to App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: The **\*.azurewebsites.net** domain name already comes with an SSL certificate, and if you use your custom domain, you can bring your SSL certificate for it to App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: There is a monthly charge (prorated hourly) associated with each SSL certificate.
trans-unit.target: There is a monthly charge (prorated hourly) associated with each SSL certificate.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [App Service Pricing Details].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [App Service Pricing Details].

trans-unit.source: [Authenticate users] against the corporate directory.
trans-unit.target: [Authenticate users] against the corporate directory.

trans-unit.source: App Service Web Apps can authenticate users with on-premises identity providers, such as Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS), or with an Azure Active Directory tenant that has been synchronized with your corporate Active Directory deployment.
trans-unit.target: App Service Web Apps can authenticate users with on-premises identity providers, such as Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS), or with an Azure Active Directory tenant that has been synchronized with your corporate Active Directory deployment.

trans-unit.source: Users can access your web properties in Web Apps through single sign-on when they are on-site and when they are in the field.
trans-unit.target: Users can access your web properties in Web Apps through single sign-on when they are on-site and when they are in the field.

trans-unit.source: Existing services, such as Office 365 or Microsoft Intune, already use Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Existing services, such as Office 365 or Microsoft Intune, already use Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Through [Easy Auth], turning on authentication with the same Azure Active Directory tenant for your web app is very easy.
trans-unit.target: Through [Easy Auth], turning on authentication with the same Azure Active Directory tenant for your web app is very easy.

trans-unit.source: [Authorize users] for their use of web properties.
trans-unit.target: [Authorize users] for their use of web properties.

trans-unit.source: With minimal additional code, you can bring the same on-premises ASP.NET coding pattern to App Service Web Apps using the `[Authorize]` decoration, for example.
trans-unit.target: With minimal additional code, you can bring the same on-premises ASP.NET coding pattern to App Service Web Apps using the `[Authorize]` decoration, for example.

trans-unit.source: You retain the same flexibility for fine-grain access control as the applications you maintain on-premises.
trans-unit.target: You retain the same flexibility for fine-grain access control as the applications you maintain on-premises.

trans-unit.source: Connect to on-premises resources
trans-unit.target: Connect to on-premises resources

trans-unit.source: Connect to your web app data or resources, whether it's in the cloud for performance or on-premises for compliance.
trans-unit.target: Connect to your web app data or resources, whether it's in the cloud for performance or on-premises for compliance.

trans-unit.source: For more information on keeping data in Azure, see [Azure Trust Center].
trans-unit.target: For more information on keeping data in Azure, see [Azure Trust Center].

trans-unit.source: You can choose from various database backends in Azure to meet the needs of your web app, including [Azure SQL Database] and [MySQL].
trans-unit.target: You can choose from various database backends in Azure to meet the needs of your web app, including [Azure SQL Database] and [MySQL].

trans-unit.source: Keeping your data securely in Azure makes data close to your web app geographically and optimizes its performance.
trans-unit.target: Keeping your data securely in Azure makes data close to your web app geographically and optimizes its performance.

trans-unit.source: However, your business may require its data to be kept on-premises.
trans-unit.target: However, your business may require its data to be kept on-premises.

trans-unit.source: App Service Web Apps lets you easily set up a [hybrid connection] to your on-premise resource such as a database backend.
trans-unit.target: App Service Web Apps lets you easily set up a [hybrid connection] to your on-premise resource such as a database backend.

trans-unit.source: If you want unified management of your on-premises connections, you integrate many web apps with one [Azure Virtual Network] that has a site-to-site VPN.
trans-unit.target: If you want unified management of your on-premises connections, you integrate many web apps with one [Azure Virtual Network] that has a site-to-site VPN.

trans-unit.source: You can then access on-premises resources as if your web apps are on-premises.
trans-unit.target: You can then access on-premises resources as if your web apps are on-premises.

trans-unit.source: Optimize
trans-unit.target: Optimize

trans-unit.source: Optimize your line-of-business application by scaling automatically with Autoscale, caching with Azure Redis Cache, running background tasks with WebJobs, and maintaining high availability with Azure Traffic Manager.
trans-unit.target: Optimize your line-of-business application by scaling automatically with Autoscale, caching with Azure Redis Cache, running background tasks with WebJobs, and maintaining high availability with Azure Traffic Manager.

trans-unit.source: The ability of App Service Web Apps to [scale up and out] meets the need of your line-of-business application, regardless of the size of your workload.
trans-unit.target: The ability of App Service Web Apps to [scale up and out] meets the need of your line-of-business application, regardless of the size of your workload.

trans-unit.source: Scale out your web app manually through the [Azure Management Portal], programmatically through the [Service Management API] or [PowerShell scripting], or automatically through the Autoscale feature.
trans-unit.target: Scale out your web app manually through the [Azure Management Portal], programmatically through the [Service Management API] or [PowerShell scripting], or automatically through the Autoscale feature.

trans-unit.source: In the **Standard** tier, Autoscale enables you to scale out a web app automatically based on CPU utilization.
trans-unit.target: In the **Standard** tier, Autoscale enables you to scale out a web app automatically based on CPU utilization.

trans-unit.source: For best practices, see [Troy Hunt]'s [10 things I learned about rapidly scaling web apps with Azure].
trans-unit.target: For best practices, see [Troy Hunt]'s [10 things I learned about rapidly scaling web apps with Azure].

trans-unit.source: Make your web app more responsive with the [Azure Redis Cache].
trans-unit.target: Make your web app more responsive with the [Azure Redis Cache].

trans-unit.source: Use it to cache data from backend databases and other things such as the [ASP.NET session state] and [output cache].
trans-unit.target: Use it to cache data from backend databases and other things such as the [ASP.NET session state] and [output cache].

trans-unit.source: Maintain high availability of your web app using [Azure Traffic Manager].
trans-unit.target: Maintain high availability of your web app using [Azure Traffic Manager].

trans-unit.source: Using the **Failover** method, Traffic Manager automatically routes traffic to a secondary site if there is a problem on the primary site.
trans-unit.target: Using the **Failover** method, Traffic Manager automatically routes traffic to a secondary site if there is a problem on the primary site.

trans-unit.source: Monitor and analyze
trans-unit.target: Monitor and analyze

trans-unit.source: Stay up-to-date on your web app's performance with Azure or third-party tools.
trans-unit.target: Stay up-to-date on your web app's performance with Azure or third-party tools.

trans-unit.source: Receive alerts on critical web app events.
trans-unit.target: Receive alerts on critical web app events.

trans-unit.source: Gain user insight easily with Application Insight or with web log analytics from HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Gain user insight easily with Application Insight or with web log analytics from HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Get a [quick glance] of the web app's current performance metrics and resource quotas in the web app's blade in the [Azure preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715).
trans-unit.target: Get a [quick glance] of the web app's current performance metrics and resource quotas in the web app's blade in the [Azure preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715).

trans-unit.source: For a 360° view of your application across availability, performance and usage, use [Azure Application Insights] to give you fast & powerful troubleshooting, diagnostics and usage insights.
trans-unit.target: For a 360° view of your application across availability, performance and usage, use [Azure Application Insights] to give you fast & powerful troubleshooting, diagnostics and usage insights.

trans-unit.source: Or, use a third-party tool like [New Relic] to provide advanced monitoring data for your web apps.
trans-unit.target: Or, use a third-party tool like [New Relic] to provide advanced monitoring data for your web apps.

trans-unit.source: In the **Standard** tier, monitor app responsiveness receive email notifications whenever your app becomes unresponsive.
trans-unit.target: In the **Standard** tier, monitor app responsiveness receive email notifications whenever your app becomes unresponsive.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Receive Alert Notifications and Manage Alert Rules in Azure].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [How to: Receive Alert Notifications and Manage Alert Rules in Azure].

trans-unit.source: More Resources
trans-unit.target: More Resources

trans-unit.source: App Service Web Apps Documentation
trans-unit.target: App Service Web Apps Documentation

trans-unit.target: Learning Map for Azure App Service Web Apps

trans-unit.target: Azure Web Blog

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to [Try App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=523751), where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to [Try App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=523751), where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.

trans-unit.source: No credit cards required; no commitments.
trans-unit.target: No credit cards required; no commitments.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
